32f5a6bf-ed55-4d53-abe3-826c9cddf856.description: ASIS Membership connects security management professionals with the industry standards, certifications, and network they need to ensure success and growth in their career.
32f5a6bf-ed55-4d53-abe3-826c9cddf856.name: ASIS Member

badge_template_activities.title: Active Security Management Professional
Membership activated upon submission, review, and approval of application

71fbf093-3a3c-4bf5-8ef3-c6d6a8e9649c.description: The gold standard for more than 40 plus years, the Certified Protection Professional (CPP) credential provides demonstrable proof of knowledge and management skills in seven key domains of security. Earning a CPP provides independent confirmation of your ability to assume leadership responsibilities and effectively manage broad security concerns. Those who earn the CPP are ASIS board certified in security management.
71fbf093-3a3c-4bf5-8ef3-c6d6a8e9649c.name: Certified Protection Professional (CPP)

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve passing score

499f300b-5f20-4211-b891-3f453343ce9b.description: ASIS Chapter officer. Must hold ASIS membership in order to hold volunteer leadership role. Elected at chapter AGM.
499f300b-5f20-4211-b891-3f453343ce9b.name: ASIS Chapter Officer

badge_template_activities.title: ASIS Chapter officer. Must hold ASIS membership in order to hold volunteer leadership role. Elected at chapter AGM.

931c53b1-b32f-48d6-b741-bc5447b69dc6.description: The Physical Security Professional (PSP) credential demonstrates your knowledge of threat assessments and risk analyses; integrated physical security systems; and the appropriate identification, implementation, an ongoing evaluation of security measures. Earning a PSP demonstrates your expertise in managing physical security surveys, cost analyses, systems procurement, final acceptance testing, and implementation procedures. Those who earn the PSP are ASIS board certified in physical security.
931c53b1-b32f-48d6-b741-bc5447b69dc6.name: Physical Security Professional (PSP)

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve passing score

7021642f-f50b-4b4c-9318-9119735a38a2.description: ASIS' CSO Center for Leadership & Development is dedicated to assisting security executives in career development and elevating the status of security professionals in the C-suite and beyond. The CSO Center provides opportunities and resources for CSOs to network, collaborate, and learn in-person and virtually with colleagues from around the world.
7021642f-f50b-4b4c-9318-9119735a38a2.name: ASIS CSO Center Member

badge_template_activities.title: A qualifying individual is the highest-level security professional in the organization. Deputies of CSOs are also eligible with support from the CSO of their qualifying organization.
A qualifying individual is in a strategic role, not a sales or business development role.

A qualifying individual works at  an organizations that meets ONE of the following requirements:  Corporation with at least $500 million USD in gross annual revenue or a business unit, division or subsidiary with at least $300 million USD in gross annual revenue; A company that provides security services as its principal business and has at least $300 million USD in gross annual revenues; Significant element of critical infrastructure; Significant government agency or not-for-profit organization
Membership activated upon review and approval of application.

573e81f7-2da9-4942-b45b-cb3bf2abe364.description: ASIS Student Membership connects aspiring security management professionals with the resources they need to learn, network, and get connected.
573e81f7-2da9-4942-b45b-cb3bf2abe364.name: ASIS Student Member

badge_template_activities.title: Full-time degree candidates taking at least nine credit hours in an undergraduate program, or at least six credit hours in a graduate degree program, are eligible for student membership. This membership package supports members in their early years of study of the industry and therefore is not available to members who are advance in their careers and returning to school.
Membership activated upon submission, review, and approval of application

7c038c8c-45d5-4586-9791-4b5aa39e1a8c.description: The Professional Certified Investigator (PCI) credential provides proof of knowledge and experience in case management, evidence collection, and preparation of reports and testimony to substantiate findings. Earning a PCI provides independent confirmation of specialized skills in security investigations, including case evaluation and review of options for case management strategies. Those who earn the PCI are ASIS board certified in investigations.
7c038c8c-45d5-4586-9791-4b5aa39e1a8c.name: Professional Certified Investigator (PCI)

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve passing score

ccf64c28-16f1-4903-9b56-49b909a39122.description: ASIS Chapter leader; must hold ASIS membership. Voted on position in Chapter AGM.
ccf64c28-16f1-4903-9b56-49b909a39122.name: ASIS Chapter Chair

badge_template_activities.title: ASIS Chapter leader.

23b2c5f0-d4b2-47c9-90e5-049763803439.description: This badge recognizes individuals who support the security management profession with financial donations to the ASIS Foundation. The ASIS Foundation was founded as an affiliate of ASIS International in 1966 to serve the security industry through education and research. The Foundation provides an opportunity to give back to security industry colleagues and awards more than 100 grants and scholarships annually to support security professionals.
23b2c5f0-d4b2-47c9-90e5-049763803439.name: ASIS Foundation Donor

badge_template_activities.title: Donate $25 or more to the ASIS Foundation, a 501(c)3 organization that provides research and scholarships to support the security management profession.

51873729-90e4-4707-937a-c94dfe92ba60.description: Earners of the Essentials of ESRM certificate demonstrate knowledge in Enterprise Security Risk Management. They have demonstrated understanding of the components of ESRM and how they work together to create a holistic approach to risk management. They have also demonstrated understanding and application of the ESRM Cycle in an effort to mitigate risks.
51873729-90e4-4707-937a-c94dfe92ba60.name: Essentials of ESRM Certificate

alignments.name: Enterprise Security Risk Management (ESRM) Guideline
alignments.description: This Guideline describes the ESRM approach and explains how it can enhance a security program while aligning security resources with organizational strategy to manage risk. Utilizing ESRM security professionals work with asset owners to identify and prioritize assets and risks in order to mitigate those risks and create a holistic security program.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of ESRM online course.
Pass the Essentials of ESRM certificate exam.

4ed915ca-d4d8-462e-bef2-0dfed99aa516.description: Serves as a Community Steering Committee member to help guide Community to deliver business planning and work directly with HQ for any planning related to communities. Must be a member of Community, and of ASIS.
4ed915ca-d4d8-462e-bef2-0dfed99aa516.name: ASIS Community Steering Committee member

badge_template_activities.title: Serves as a Community Steering Committee member to help guide Community to deliver business planning and work directly with HQ for any planning related to communities.

c59ac211-0ca6-442d-8435-b1bfd3b5a806.description: The Associate Protection Professional (APP) designation is intended for those with 1-4 years of security management experience. The exam measures the professional's knowledge of security management fundamentals, business operations, risk management, and response management. Those who earn the APP are ASIS board certified in security management fundamentals.
c59ac211-0ca6-442d-8435-b1bfd3b5a806.name: Associate Protection Professional (APP)

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve passing score

277231a7-201d-41f2-b50c-a0fa47bbc549.description: Volunteer role assigned by Regional Vice President. RVP may assign two - five per region. Must hold ASIS membership.
277231a7-201d-41f2-b50c-a0fa47bbc549.name: ASIS Assistant Regional Vice President (ARVP)

badge_template_activities.title: Volunteer role assigned by RVP in region.

622caca6-0947-47f3-a66f-a89f1ccf44a7.description: ASIS Retired Membership connects security management professionals who are now retired with the industry trends, insights, and network to keep them informed and engaged.
622caca6-0947-47f3-a66f-a89f1ccf44a7.name: ASIS Retired Member

badge_template_activities.title: Such membership may be conferred upon individuals who have reached the age of 67 and will enter full retirement on or after January of the calendar dues year, who no longer practice as a security professional but who, at the time they seek retired member status, have been a member for the immediate past ten (10) consecutive years.
Membership activated upon submission, review, and approval of application

6690a25c-5fb9-4868-9eb1-1dc8d55c89ec.description: ASIS Life Membership recognizes long time, now retired, members who have given significantly to the industry and association by rewarding them with lifetime membership.
6690a25c-5fb9-4868-9eb1-1dc8d55c89ec.name: ASIS Life Member

badge_template_activities.title: Such membership may be awarded to any active member in good standing for at least twenty (20) consecutive years, has permanently retired from full-time employment, and has made a notable contribution to ASIS International.
Membership activated upon submission, review, and approval of application

dc73f1b9-a31f-4ee1-8219-61647fba02cd.description: ASIS Foundation donors help security professionals achieve their career goals by funding certification scholarships, practical research, member hardship grants, and more.
dc73f1b9-a31f-4ee1-8219-61647fba02cd.name: ASIS Foundation Fitness Challenge Donor

badge_template_activities.title: Donated to the ASIS Foundation to support its Fitness Challenge fundraiser.
Participated in the ASIS Foundation virtual Fitness Challenge.

cf44e5e1-fe50-4901-9c04-e772fceebb99.description: Earners of the Essentials of Security Risk Assessment certificate demonstrate knowledge in the security risk assessment process. They have demonstrated understanding of organizational risk, the risk assessment process, and the role of incident reporting in data collection. They have demonstrated understanding of how they may participate as part of a security risk assessment team to conduct a site survey or evaluate countermeasures.
cf44e5e1-fe50-4901-9c04-e772fceebb99.name: Essentials of Security Risk Assessment Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of Security Risk Assessment online course.
Pass the Essentials of Security Risk Assessment certificate exam.

b95e7838-e397-42aa-b758-2561f5ab7b2f.description: Earners of the Essentials of Executive Protection certificate demonstrate knowledge in the field of executive protection. They have demonstrated understanding of the types of executive protection, key skills of executive protection professionals, the role of threat and vulnerability risk assessments in executive protection, and benefits of protective intelligence. They also know how to assess specific EP threats and vulnerabilities and conduct an advance.
b95e7838-e397-42aa-b758-2561f5ab7b2f.name: Essentials of Executive Protection Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of Executive Protection online course.
Pass the Essentials of Executive Protection certificate exam.

5a3ba0a3-9a83-461e-90de-df70730f8adf.description: Earners of the Essentials of Retail Asset Protection certificate demonstrate knowledge in asset protection in a retail environment. They have demonstrated knowledge in the role security plays in a retail organization, business acumen, the motives and methods of internal and external theft, tools and technologies for asset protection, and more.
5a3ba0a3-9a83-461e-90de-df70730f8adf.name: Essentials of Retail Asset Protection Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of Retail Asset Protection online course.
Pass the Essentials of Retail Asset Protection certificate exam.

2a7d1825-f5b1-4ec8-91fb-19edab3527f3.description: Serves as Regional VP to one of 51 regions across globe. Mediates with ARVPs/Chapter Chairs and maintains close rapport with SRVP and HQ. Must hold ASIS membership and past volunteer experience. Presidential appointment.
2a7d1825-f5b1-4ec8-91fb-19edab3527f3.name: ASIS Regional Vice President (RVP)

badge_template_activities.title: Serves as Regional VP to one of 51 regions across globe. Mediates with ARVPs/Chapter Chairs and maintains close rapport with SRVP and HQ. Must hold ASIS membership and past volunteer experience. Presidential Appointment.

712a7cf4-e24e-4134-8a5c-73cad1b40342.description: Earners of the Essentials of WVPI Programs certificate demonstrate knowledge essential to a workplace violence prevention and intervention program. They have demonstrated understanding of the precursors and actions that constitute workplace violence and how organizations should process and investigate concerning behaviors. They can develop the basics of a WVPI training program, communication plans, and identify roles and responsibilities of a threat management team.
712a7cf4-e24e-4134-8a5c-73cad1b40342.name: Essentials of Workplace Violence Prevention and Intervention (WVPI) Programs Certificate

alignments.name: Workplace Violence and Active Assailant - Prevention, Intervention, and Response Standard
alignments.description: This Standard describes the implementation of a workplace violence prevention and intervention (WVPI) program and personnel within organizations who typically become involved in prevention and intervention efforts.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of Workplace Violence Prevention and Intervention Programs online course.
Pass the Essentials of Workplace Violence Prevention and Intervention Programs certificate exam.

3697f054-2db3-47cd-8438-afc010e23783.description: This award recognizes certified security professionals who have made significant contributions to the enhancement and advancement of the CPP, PSP, PCI, or APP designation. Awarded by the ASIS Professional Certification Board (PCB).

2476c5a1-7e75-4bf8-82d3-369d07fcfd57.description: Earners of the Essentials of Pre-Employment Background Screening and Vetting (PBSV) certificate demonstrate knowledge in the field of Preemployment background screening and vetting. They have demonstrated understanding of the value and key elements of a PBSV program, the impacts of the legal and regulatory environments surrounding PBSV programs. They can also create a job description and job application based on best practice. They also have high level knowledge of the screening, vetting, and ba
2476c5a1-7e75-4bf8-82d3-369d07fcfd57.name: Essentials of Pre-Employment Background Screening and Vetting (PBSV) Certificate Program

alignments.name: Preemployment Background Screening and Vetting
alignments.description: Hiring a new employee is an important responsibility. This Guideline aids employers in developing, implementing and maintaining a preemployment background screening and vetting program to bring into the organization individuals who will be effective assets.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Essentials of Pre-Employment Background Screening and Vetting online course.

07144ad7-6cda-4cf9-bf42-529d796f35fc.description: The President’s Award of Merit is an annual award bestowed by the President of ASIS International to an individual member for distinguished service, achievement, and/or contributions. Distinguished achievement includes significant contributions to the knowledge of the profession, literature of the profession, outstanding service to ASIS International, and/or service to other organizations affiliated with the security profession.
07144ad7-6cda-4cf9-bf42-529d796f35fc.name: President's Award of Merit

badge_template_activities.title: The President’s Award of Merit is an annual award bestowed by the President of ASIS International to an individual member for distinguished service, achievement, and/or contributions. Distinguished achievement includes significant contributions to the knowledge of the profession, literature of the profession, outstanding service to ASIS International, and/or service to other organizations affiliated with the security profession.

b0897d13-3236-45e2-a201-deb7587639cf.description: The Senior Regional Vice President of the Year Award annually recognizes the significant contributions made by the outstanding Senior Regional Vice President to the chapters within the region, to ASIS International, and to the security profession during the Senior Regional Vice President’s term of office.
b0897d13-3236-45e2-a201-deb7587639cf.name: Senior Regional Vice President of the Year Award

df977daf-0b82-43e2-8371-5aca6962c5cb.description: This award honors an ASIS International female security professional who has consistently worked for the betterment of the security industry. Karen Marquez was the Co-owner and Executive Vice President of MVM, Inc., a physical security services firm based in Virginia. Karen passed away in 2006 after a long battle with cancer. During her 23-year career in security, Karen developed and implemented core administration and support functions.
df977daf-0b82-43e2-8371-5aca6962c5cb.name: Women in Security Global Community Karen Marquez Honors

badge_template_activities.title: This award honors an ASIS International female security professional who has consistently worked for the betterment of the security industry. Karen Marquez was the Co-owner and Executive Vice President of MVM, Inc., a physical security services firm based in Virginia. Karen passed away in 2006 after a long battle with cancer. During her 23-year career in security, Karen developed and implemented core administration and support functions.

163a0066-f836-471a-9a3e-bdc9ddf94e8d.description: The Don Walker CSO Center Security Executive Award recognizes a senior level executive who demonstrates commitment to security management education, certification, and standards and guidelines for the executive management level of the security discipline in a given enterprise. It is named in honor of ASIS Past President and Past President of the CSO Center, Don Walker, CPP, former Chairman of Securitas Security Services and one of the first co-chairs of the CSO Center.
163a0066-f836-471a-9a3e-bdc9ddf94e8d.name: Don Walker CSO Center Security Executive Award

It is named in honor of ASIS Past President and Past President of the CSO Center, Don Walker, CPP, former Chairman of Securitas Security Services and one of the first co-chairs of the CSO Center.

b92c6dba-6c2e-4ead-8db3-7a09471f3d83.description: This award celebrates an ASIS International member who has exhibited selfless devotion at the volunteer level, emphasizing significant contributions at the chapter and regional levels over an extended period of time.

656c1ade-b656-448f-b2e3-c7cea4211b7b.description: The Regional Vice President of the Year Award annually recognizes the significant contributions made by the outstanding Regional Vice President to the chapters within the region, to ASIS International, and to the security profession during the Regional Vice President’s term of office.

eacf31ab-b4b5-4bae-b50d-3badefeecb15.description: This award recognizes an ASIS member who has exhibited selfless devotion as a volunteer, emphasizing significant contributions at the community steering committee level over an extended period. Nominations may be submitted by a Community Vice President, Community Chairperson, or Vice Chairperson. The candidate’s nomination will be assessed based on years of service, contributions, and leadership provided.
eacf31ab-b4b5-4bae-b50d-3badefeecb15.name: Roy N. Bordes, CPP Community Member Award of Excellence

The candidate’s nomination will be assessed based on years of service, contributions, and leadership provided.

20a159d7-1897-4e49-9b35-1d5a2ec64b9d.description: This award honors an ASIS International member under age 40 who demonstrates a dedication to the security industry through strong leadership, teamwork, and innovation, while continually developing their knowledge and experience, necessary in this ever-changing industry. The Young Professional must also be a strong advocate of ASIS’s mission to support, grow, and nurture the security industry.

The Young Professional must also be a strong advocate of ASIS’s mission to support, grow, and nurture the security industry.

1424b84a-a227-4bb9-b94f-7cdf7052dd34.name: ASIS Regional Advisory Committee Chair

badge_template_activities.title: Serves as chair of Regional Advisory Committee. Must hold current ASIS membership.

aac2ef5b-7f97-444c-837a-aa89cdb15cf0.description: The Community Chair of the Year Award annually recognizes the significant contributions made by the outstanding Community Chair to the community, to ASIS International, and to the security profession during the Chair's term of office.
aac2ef5b-7f97-444c-837a-aa89cdb15cf0.name: Community Chair of the Year Award

badge_template_activities.title: The Community Chair of the Year Award annually recognizes the significant contributions made by the outstanding Community Chair to the community, to ASIS International, and to the security profession during the Chair's term of office.

5a42a634-6657-4aad-b5fc-47178652ced9.description: Each year, one security officer is recognized by the ASIS Security Services Community (SSC) for outstanding service/acts in the security profession through the Ralph Day Security Officer Heroism Award. This award is meant for those that perform a heroic act that involves circumstances where a private security officer risks his or her life to save another person. The award nominee must be an employee of a contract security company employed as a security officer.
5a42a634-6657-4aad-b5fc-47178652ced9.name: Ralph Day Memorial Security Officer Heroism Award - Honorable Mention

badge_template_activities.title: Each year, one security officer is recognized by the ASIS Security Services Community (SSC) for outstanding service/acts in the security profession through the Ralph Day Security Officer Heroism Award. This award is meant for those that perform a heroic act that involves circumstances where a private security officer risks his or her life to save another person. The award nominee must be an employee of a contract security company employed as a security officer.

e5e21925-3d9d-464f-90c3-86cbec197399.description: The ASIS Security Industry Book of the Year is selected by a panel of ASIS members who review member-authored titles using criteria including relevancy to today’s security threats, importance of the subject in the field, and the uniqueness of the coverage of a new security concept, idea or technology.
e5e21925-3d9d-464f-90c3-86cbec197399.name: Security Book of the Year

badge_template_activities.title: The ASIS Security Industry Book of the Year is selected by a panel of ASIS members who review member-authored titles using criteria including relevancy to today’s security threats, importance of the subject in the field, and the uniqueness of the coverage of a new security concept, idea or technology.

1c099779-4487-465c-a4bb-8ef2a02ae54d.description: The ASIS Associate Protection Professional (APP) - Life Certified (Retired) designation is awarded to active APPs who have maintained the certification for 12 consecutive years and have fully retired from any security-related employment.
1c099779-4487-465c-a4bb-8ef2a02ae54d.name: APP - Life Certified (Retired)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass the APP exam.

716a0344-22be-416a-9573-35fa4263ad5b.description: The ASIS Certified Protection Professional (CPP) - Life Certified (Retired) designation is awarded to active CPPs who have maintained the certification for 12 consecutive years and have fully retired from any security-related employment.
716a0344-22be-416a-9573-35fa4263ad5b.name: CPP® - Life Certified (Retired)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass the CPP exam.

91df4886-25df-41e2-a28c-b99c10e0985b.description: The ASIS Professional Certified Investigator (PCI) - Life Certified (Retired) designation is awarded to active PCIs who have maintained the certification for 12 consecutive years and have fully retired from any security-related employment.
91df4886-25df-41e2-a28c-b99c10e0985b.name: PCI® - Life Certified (Retired)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass the PCI exam.

8ed12a86-634a-4313-be01-36fd712449c7.description: The ASIS Physical Certified Professional (PSP) - Life Certified (Retired) designation is awarded to active PSPs who have maintained the certification for 12 consecutive years and have fully retired from any security-related employment.
8ed12a86-634a-4313-be01-36fd712449c7.name: PSP® - Life Certified (Retired)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully pass the PSP exam.
